title: PE版和Win 10版 0.15.10 - 更新日志
author: Wolverine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wolverine 于 2016-10-5 13:36 编辑 



Hello! The 0.15.10 update for Pocket and Windows 10 Edition slunk out during the dark hours of the night, bringing with it the chilling Campfire Tales skin pack and squishing a fair few bugs.
大家好！携带版和Win 10版已经更新到 0.15.0 了。那是一个漆黑的夜晚，伴随着篝火传奇皮肤包的加入，以及修复若干漏洞。

We’ve been having a few issues distributing the special MINECON skins and associated capes. They are meant to be free, but some users have been asked for money while trying to obtain them through the Google Play store. If you do get prompted for a fee, use the code MINECON2016, and it should let you have them for the correct price of zero money.
参加MINECON附赠的皮肤和披风出了小问题。某些用户需要支付金钱才能获得本应该是免费的皮肤。使用MINECON 2016提供的代码应该可以解决这个问题。

Android users who want the skins should do this as soon as possible - the skins won’t be available for much longer!
问题主要出现在安卓用户身上，越早使用上面提供的方法解决问题越好 - 因为限免服务很快就到期了！

Anyway, on to the log:
总之，以下是更新日志：

New Features:
新特性：

Campfire Tales skin pack!篝火传奇皮肤包！

Tweaks:
调整：

Fixed mirror texture issues.修复了镜子的材质问题Small fix to smart turning. (VR only)Smart Turning的微小调整（仅限VR版本）Capes no longer clip through armor.盔甲和披风不兼容

Bug Fixes:
漏洞修复：

When getting the MINECON 2016 capes, you will now be prompted to make a “free” purchase from your device’s store. If you are on Android & it prompts you for a payment, use the code MINECON2016 to get it for free.解决了Minecon 2016 披风需要收费的问题，输入MINECON 2016的代码即可。Fixed crash when rendering leads in VR. (VR only)修复了VR崩溃的问题（Rendering Leads不知道是什么意思）Using the B button to quit the game (when using a controller) now works. (Win 10 only)恢复点击B按钮（遥控器）即可退出游戏的功能（仅限 Win）Fixed top of cursor flickering in VR. (VR only)修复了VR的闪烁问题Mouse clicks no longer cause keyboard input to stop. (VR only)修复了点击鼠标停止键盘输入的问题（仅限VR）Fixed issue where Minecraft would not shut down completely when launching another app in the Oculus store. (Win 10 Oculus only)修复了当在Oculus商店启动其他应用软件时，无法正常退出Minecraft的问题。（仅限Win 10 Oculus）Added in bug fixes for VR that were previously in the 0.16 betas. Click here for 0.16 build 1 changelog and click here for 0.16 build 3 changelog!加入了所有和VR有关的漏洞修复列表。点击这里查看 0.16 build 1 更新日志，点击这里查看 0.16 build 3 更新日志！

Chilling stuff!
毛骨悚然！
